data.name: CheckM2
data.description: Assessing the quality of metagenome-derived genome bins using machine learning

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "For simplicity, you can just download CheckM2 from GitHub and run it directly without installing."
"Rapid assessment of genome bin quality using machine learning." and usage via `checkm2 predict` indicate it is a command-line tool users run directly, not a library.

"The main use of CheckM2 is to predict the completeness and contamination of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) and single-amplified genomes (SAGs)..." shows it directly produces research-relevant quality metrics for genomes.
